column4: so what if the Eskimos have 200 words for snow ?! how many more ways can you say "perl" ?

I'm getting a little tired of the Burger King school of OS development . if just one more developer gives in to just one more whining compulsive bug submitter I swear I'll drop a cargo container of starving PCP/crack/meth crazed penguins on their ice cream and cake social
but I try to appeal to the masses :D
